name: Squats
description: Squats are a compound exercise that targets the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Push-ups
description: Push-ups are a bodyweight exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Deadlifts
description: Deadlifts are a compound exercise that targets the lower back, glutes, hamstrings, and forearms.

name: Pull-ups
description: Pull-ups are a bodyweight exercise that targets the back, biceps, and shoulders.
